gpickler Module Functions¶

This module contians compression utilities intended to put objects into a format sendable through waggle.

gPickler.gPickle(data)¶

Returns a gPickled representation of any information sent to it.

Parameters:data (object) – The sensor data to gPickle
Return type:string
gPickler.un_gPickle(data)¶

Given some gPickled data, restores it to its original form.

Parameters:data (string) – The data to be un gPickled
Return type:object
